data.eml:eml: Additions to the description of Paroplocephalus atriceps (Serpentes: Elapidae) with a discussion on pupil shape in it and other Australian snakes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bush, Brian (2017): Additions to the description of Paroplocephalus atriceps (Serpentes: Elapidae) with a discussion on pupil shape in it and other Australian snakes. Zootaxa 4344 (2): 333-344, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4344.2.8
